LanguageData.VFEE_SteleSmall.label: мала стела
LanguageData.VFEE_SteleSmall.description: A slender, modest slab with limited engravings on the sides. Steles have been used since ancient times to memorialize individuals, battles, and other important events.
LanguageData.VFEE_SteleSmall_Blueprint.label: small stele (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFEE_SteleSmall_Frame.label: small stele (building)
LanguageData.VFEE_SteleSmall_Frame.description: A slender, modest slab with limited engravings on the sides. Steles have been used since ancient times to memorialize individuals, battles, and other important events.
LanguageData.VFEE_Bomb.label: бомба
LanguageData.VFEE_Bomb.description: A small, makeshift bomb. Can be easily defused if found on time.
